GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array containing a single article corresponding to the parameter

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array containing all comments with a corresponding article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Creates a new comment attatched to the given article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates the votes value on the given article_id

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Updates the votes value on the given article_id
